author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3379 (partial): Updated some comments in buildDss, and converted comments for method finalizeDssLength into JavaDoc.

author: hindessm
msg: Make platformReadLink implementation simpler (size can never be larger than
HyMaxPath because readlink returns the size written to the buffer not the
true size).  The api of this function is horrible.  We probably need a
portlib readlink function since we have several (incorrect/misleading) uses

author: enis
